title: Too much flashing in Control Example
description: The Control Example is currently experiencing excessive flashing.
OB: The entire outermost frames are being repeatedly repainted, causing excessive flashing.
EB: Only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted, reducing the flashing issue.
SR:
To reproduce the issue:
1. Open the Control Example.
2. Observe the excessive flashing.
3. Note that the entire outermost frames are being repainted.
